metadata.Title: CVE-2013-2042 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in ownCloud before 4.0.15, 4.5.x before 4.5.11, and 5.0.x before 5.0.6 allow remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the url parameter to (1) apps/bookmarks/ajax/addBookmark.php or (2) apps/bookmarks/ajax/editBookmark.php.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2042` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> owncloud packages in Ubuntu are now empty

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
